title: Welcome to online learning couuse Rise of the Containers
content:
Welcome To learn magic of Kubernetes, you need to become magician. In this course we are going to learn Docker & Kubernetes. Most of the content is video tutorials and exercises. I highly recommend to do exercises and practice, to learn tech stuff hands-on is must.
Modules  Docker Kubernetes Objects & Workloads
